name: arrayFindAll
description: Searches an array for all positions of a specified value. The function searches for simple values such as strings and numbers or for complex objects such as structures. When the second parameter is a simple value, string searches are case-sensitive

params.name: array
params.description: The source array to search through

params.name: value or callback
params.description: If string, case-sensitive value to search for; if callback, use signature function (item, index, array) : boolean

examples.title: List all courses with participants
